Articles.Content:
Seers 4-6 have been cancled. Seer 7 will shock you all. Then, Falcon 2 will shock you once again.

- - - Updated - - -

You better hold onto your seats. Project Neutron will allow us to win this space race quickly.

Not exactly. The ,goal is not mun, but to be the,first to colonise the moons of jool

Then I'm going to test the stuff on the moon.

And Project Neutron is evolvable, allowing us to have crafts with payload capacities of over 150 tons

Nuclear energy seems to be simple and cheap.'

I wonder if I can make a nuclear engine to power a ship like the Hermes

The Neutron rocket is almost ready for its first flight

- - - Updated - - -

We have man rated the Neutron

- - - Updated - - -

Any of you guys have missions today?
Ayup, it's a big one too.

We at Khina are ready to make a true first of Kerbin. It will remained classified until it is declared successful. However, we can tell you that we have just man-rated a heavy lift rocket. Hold on to your seats, we are about to rock your world.
All info is classified until this mission is over:

Tragedy struck Voyager Nation today. Sidski Kerman was killed on the first attempt to land on the Mun. During launch, a deadly amount of gas flooded the command pod. Ground controllers could do nothing to help. He became the first kerbal to die in space. R.I.P Sidski

Edited October 8, 2015 by Voyager275

Our apologies go out to the Voyager Nation. We will fly a Pheonix 2 flag aboard our next mission in memory.

- - - Updated - - -

The Kanadians are putting boots on the Mun...
All Voyager Nation Mun landings are cancelled due to Sidski's death. Our sights are set on Duna for our next manned missions, a safer spacecraft will also be constructed
Falcon 2 has put a kerbal in the Mun's SOI!!! This is a major event in history.
Actually, I am officially pulling out of the race in favor of a more dubious project. an entire youtube series focused on the entire history of the NASA Space Shuttles. Core mod is the SSP.

Not much in the way of mission reports happening here. In the last four pages there are only three pics from an actual mission. The last page or two have stepped firmly into roleplay territory despite earlier guidelines. I'm afraid this one must be closed.
